title: Sivir Pineapple Pizza
body:
I think Riot should add some chromas for Sivir pizza delivery skin because of its Hawaiian pizza.
Some Idea for the chroma each chroma is one type of pizza,
 Neapolitan Pizza,Sicilian Pizza,Greek Pizza, California Pizza
New York Style Pizza, Chicago Pizza

and others types. just an idea.
I thinks it sound good.

{{sticker:sg-jinx}}

replies.body:
Don't worry! I ate a whole month of pizza for research. I'm not letting this research goto waste!
